name: Pocket Beach (Mini Jam submission)
description:
*disclaimer* This game is very buggy, I know. If i had more time, I would have fixed the numerous errors.

I recommend playing in fullscreen so you can see the score counter and also view the beautiful art.

The controls are as follows: WASD to move, Enter to reset game.

Your goal is to push all the junk as far to the right as possible. The junk is pushed like in sokoban. Every 6 seconds, a new piece spawns.

Once you've filled up the whole column to the right with junk, it is supposed to be cleared away and you get points.

When there are more than 13 pieces of junk on screen at the same time, it's game over.

If a red piece of junk spawns in between two squares, you can't push it to the left or right. I recommend resetting the game if this happens too many times.
